Muto popped up to talk to me recently. Here is what she said: "Suezo is smart. That's why it only has one eye."

weird game wisdom? bad translation? what in blazes can she possibly mean???

By Zidane on Sunday, June 2, 2002 - 02:08 pm:

Who is Muto? I think that means that Suezo is
smart enough to live with only 1 eye.

By torey_luvullo on Sunday, June 2, 2002 - 04:43 pm:

Muto is a trainer who doesnt appear until you unlock her storyline. i did it by being in goat right after venture with my young mocchi, which she mistook for her older mocchi, syrup.
